name: Centerize YouTube Player in Half Screen
description:
Don't you hate how YouTube Player is not centered to a split screen browser window? Well I do! Split screen is available on all major operating system since:
    Windows 7+
    Apple El Capitan+
    Most Linux Desktop Managers (Such as Cinnamon)
Yet when you make a half screen browser window with YouTube running, the YouTube player is right of center! This bothered me so this quickly centers the player when the browser is half screen size! (Might not work on other resolutions which are not Full HD 1080p)
